casebody.data:
CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

February 12, 2014

[Cite as 2H2/14 Case Announcements, 2014-Ohio-473.]

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

2012-1742. State of ex rel. Sylvester v. Neal.

In Mandamus. This cause originated in this court on the filing of a complaint for a writ of mandamus.

Upon consideration of the motion of amicus curiae Ohio Attorney General Michael DeWine to participate in oral argument scheduled for Tuesday, February 25, 2014, within time allotted to respondents, it is ordered by the court that the motion is granted and amicus curiae shall share the time allotted to respondents.
